English:
Hey! What is this?! HEY!
What do you mean, "Digital Shift"?!
German:
He! Was ist das denn?! HE!
Was soll das heißen, „digitale Verschiebung“?!

English:
Ah! Aaaah! Kyaaah! What the heck is this?!
Did I fall asleep on my feet again?
Chinese:
那那那那那個是……什麼？
我……是在做夢……嗎？
Korean:
저저저저저건… 뭐죠!?
저… 꿈이라도 꾸고 있는… 건가요…?
German:
Ah! Aaah! Gaaah! Was zum Teufel ist los?!
Bin ich wieder im Stehen eingeschlafen?

English:
Who would come here this late at night? I wonder.
Perhaps they're here... for me!
Chinese:
哎～呀，討厭，這麼晚了人類居然還在。
怎樣，難道這就是所謂的堵人？
Korean:
어~머 싫어라, 이런 밤중에 인간이 있다니
…뭐야, 혹시 기다리고 있었던 거야?
German:
Wer würde denn so spät noch kommen?
Vielleicht sind die ... wegen mir hier!

English:
My faaaans! My adoring public is here to greet me!
Tell me, are you crazy-obsessed with my awesome
tunes?
Chinese:
你們是我的歌迷吧？
我的歌好聽到讓你們全身發麻了吧？
Korean:
너희들, 내 팬이구나?
내 노래에 넋을 잃은 거구나!?
German:
Meine Fans! Mein begeistertes Publikum will mich
treffen! Sagt es mir, gehen euch meine mega
Songs nicht mehr aus dem Kopf?

English:
You know it!
Uh... No.
We're obsessed with something else entirely.
Chinese:
正是那樣。
怎麼可能。
從另一個角度看來，確實覺得全身發麻。
Korean:
그렇습니다
그럴 리 없잖아
다른 의미로 넋을 잃었습니다
German:
Na, aber hallo!
Äh ... Nein.
Wir haben andere Dinge im Kopf.

English:
Huh? You sure? I mean, you don't seem all that
psyched to be in my presence. What kinda fans
are you?
Chinese:
你在說什麼？不需要害羞唷？
其實是我的頭號歌迷吧？
Korean:
뭐라고? …부끄러워 하지 않아도 된다고?
사실은 내 광팬이잖아?
German:
Wie? Ganz sicher? Ihr flippt ja gar nicht aus vor
Begeisterung. Was seid ihr denn für Fans?

English:
Hehehe! Finally, recognition! You know the true
sonic arts when you hear them!
Chinese:
呵呵♪
你很瞭解什麼是真正的音樂呢。
Korean:
흐흥♪ 너, 뭘 좀 알잖아
진짜 음악이 어떤 건지, 말이야
German:
Hihihi! Endlich werde ich mal gewürdigt! Ihr seid
Kenner echter Klangkunst!

English:
Well, since you clearly rock hard to my thundering
beats and epic melodies, I'll have to drag you
onstage!
Chinese:
對於這樣子的你，我會招・待・你參加
我的個人演唱會♪
Korean:
그런 널, 내 온리 라이브 스테이지에
초대해 줄 게♪
German:
Na, nachdem ihr zu meinen heftigen Beats und
epischen Melodien abrockt, muss ich euch wohl
auf die Bühne zerren!

Chinese:
好了，跟我來吧！
嗚吱～～～呀啊～～～～～～！
